thread.section_title: Advance Funds Network Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Advance Funds Network | www.advancefundsnetwork.com
thread.title: Michael
thread.title_full: Advance Funds Network reviewed by Michael

author: Michael
title: Michael
text: I've used this company in the past to obtain funding. Our rep is always fast to respond, even after business hours! He has always been extremely helpful and answered all our questions to ensure we understand the offerings available to us. I have never felt pressured or that we are being pushed into any one direction or that completion and payment is the most important thing to them. They have always been understanding and helpful. I would highly recommend any business owner to utilize their services. You'll be pleasantly surprised.
